title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Principle of measurements. Measurement of physical, rheological, mechanical, electrical properties of agricultural materials. Measurement of temperature, pressure, humidity, moisture content, velocity, discharge, force, torque, strain and displacement. Strain and stress relationship. Strain sensitive transducers. Principle and selection of transducers. Signal conditioning. Data acquisition systems. Data analysis and statistical interpretation.
